# TimeLimitTrait.Duration

**Structure**

A type representing the duration of a time limit applied to a test.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Duration
```

## Overview

Use this type to specify a test timeout with [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/TimeLimitTrait]. `TimeLimitTrait` uses this type instead of Swift’s built-in `Duration` type because the testing library doesn’t support high-precision, arbitrarily short durations for test timeouts. The smallest unit of time you can specify in a `Duration` is minutes.

## Type Methods

- **minutes(_:)**: Construct a time limit duration given a number of minutes.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
